nodes.text: Sic-Six-layer cake was a type of cake made by the arachnoid Sic-Six species from the planet Sisk. The cake had six layers ranging in color from infrared to ultraviolet. It was served in Dex's Diner on the planet Coruscant where it cost 2.7 credits.
The dish is a reference to the real-life Layer cake as well as a pun.
